snippet: The law will require doctors to notify parents of a girl, 17 and under, 48 hours before the procedure.
abstract: Illinois Supreme Court clears way for state to enforce 1995 law requiring doctors to notify parents of a girl, 17 and under, 48 hours before an abortion.
lead_paragraph: The law will require doctors to notify parents of a girl, 17 and under, 48 hours before the procedure.

headline.main: Illinois Court Says Parents Have Right to Know of Abortion Request
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Court Says Parents Have Right To Know of Abortion Request
